title: Add Enter key navigation between form fields

requirements.text: In the milk collection form, pressing Enter in the farmer ID field should move focus to the quantity field

quotes: Use enter key to move to next box like move from farmer id to quantity

acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter in the farmer ID input moves focus to the quantity input
The Enter key behavior does not interfere with existing farmer lookup functionality

requirements.text: In the milk collection form, pressing Enter in the quantity field should move focus to the fat field
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter in the quantity input moves focus to the fat input

requirements.text: In the milk collection form, pressing Enter in the fat field should trigger the save action
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter in the fat input submits the form
Success/error feedback is displayed after submission attempt

constraints: Preserve existing form submission behavior via save button
Do not interfere with existing keyboard shortcuts documented in KeyboardShortcutsHelp component
nonGoals: Changing Enter key behavior in other forms or components
Adding Tab key navigation (already handled by browser defaults)
Modifying the form layout or field order
